name: The Jon Taffer Podcast
what_you_do: Jon Taffer is a business mogul, television personality, and author known for his role as the Executive Producer and Host of the show 'Bar Rescue', where he revitalizes struggling bars and restaurants. He also founded Taffer’s Tavern and created Taffer’s Browned Butter Bourbon.
who_you_serve: Jon Taffer serves entrepreneurs, bar and restaurant owners, and individuals seeking to improve their hospitality and business strategies.
signature_programs: Don't Bullsh*t Yourself, Raise the Bar, The Power of Conflict
current_projects: Taffer’s Tavern expansion, ongoing seasons of 'Bar Rescue'
bio: New York Times best-selling author, host of 'Bar Rescue', over 250 episodes of the show, and partnerships with major brands like NFL and Anheuser-Busch.
business_focus: Jon Taffer is a business mogul, television personality, and author known for his role as the Executive Producer and Host of the show 'Bar Rescue', where he revitalizes struggling bars and restaurants. He also founded Taffer’s Tavern and created Taffer’s Browned Butter Bourbon. (hospitality)
